title: Disney Earnings, Xerox’s Bid for HP, Women in VC
itunes:title: Disney Earnings, Xerox’s Bid for HP, Women in VC
description:
Bloomberg News L.A. Bureau Chief Chris Palmeri and Bloomberg Intelligence Media analyst Gettha Ranganathan break down Disney earnings and the outlook for new streaming services. Crawford Del Prete, President at IDC Research, walks through Xerox’s bid for HP. Esmé Deprez, Bloomberg News Projects and Investigations Reporter, talks about America's biggest problems being intensified in California. Amy Nauiokas, CEO at Anthemis, discusses launching the Female Innovators Lab for the financial services industry. And we Drive to the Close with Sandip Bhagat, Chief Investment Officer of Whittier Trust.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
